name: bratishka
description: Добавляйте меня в телеграм чатики Братаны, искренне ваш @BratishkaBot https://t.me/BratishkaBot
author: Nata <natavts@gmial.com> && Igor Suvorov <hi@isuvorov.ru>

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp package.json build/ && cp yarn.lock build/ && cp README.md build/ && babel src --out-dir build --source-maps inline --copy-files
scripts.build2: rm -rf build2 && mkdir build2 && cp package.json build2/ && cp yarn.lock build2/ && cp README.md build2/ && babel src --out-dir build2 --source-maps inline --copy-files
